message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $115.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a bit more to me. Would you consider $110?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to offer $105 for it.
